actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Railroad Retirement Act of 1937 to remove all of the existing limitations upon the dollar amount of outside income which a disability annuitant or a survivor annuitant may earn while receiving an annuity thereunder.

summary.text: Removes the existing limitation upon the dollar amount of outside income which a disability annuitant or a survivor annuitant may earn while receiving an annuity under the Railroad Retirement Act of 1937.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Railroad Retirement Act of 1937 to remove all of the existing limitations upon the dollar amount of outside income which a disability annuitant or a survivor annuitant may earn while receiving an annuity thereunder.
